test-method.name: verifyVerificationModule
test-method.description: Precondition: User should be logged in and on the healthapp section 1. Login in the healthapp application 2. Scroll down menu till verification 3. Click on the verification

test-method.name: verifyVerificationSubModules
test-method.description: Precondition: User should be logged in and on the Verification section\n" + "1. Click on the Verification Module drop-down arrow\n" + "2. Click on Order

test-method.name: verifyInventoryTabsAndButtonsAreDisplayed
test-method.description: Precondition: User should be logged in and on the Verification section\n" + "1. Click on the Verification Module drop-down arrow\n" + "2. Click on Inventory + "3. Click on Requisition

test-method.name: verifyNavigationToAnotherSubModuleAfterOpeningTheInventorySection
test-method.description: Pre condition: User should be logged in and it is on verification module 1. Click on the inventory 2. Click on the pharmacy 3. User should navigate to the pharmacy section from the inventory section

test-method.name: verifyNavigationOfTabs
test-method.description: Pre condition: User should be logged in and it is on verification module 1. Click on the inventory 2. Click on the pharmacy 3. User should navigate to the pharmacy section from the inventory section

test-method.description: Pre condition: User should be logged in and it is on Requisition section1. Click on the "From" date2. Select the "From" date3. Click on the "To" date4. Select "To" date5. Click on "OK" button

test-method.name: rehectThePurchaseRequestAndVerifyStatus
test-method.description: Precondition: User should be logged in and on the Verificationn section. 1. Navigate to the "Inventory" section under Verification. 2. Click on "Purchase Request". 3. Click on the "Approved" radio button. 4. Find the previously approved Purchase Request. 5. Click on the "View" button under the action column for the Purchase Request. 6. Reject the Purchase Request. 7. Click on the "Rejected" radio button. 8. Verify that the status of the Purchase Request has changed to "Rejected".
